verses.verse: לַכֹּ֖ל <S%H3605><s%> lak-Kol everything זְמָ֑ן <S%H2165><s%> ze-Man; To every [thing there is] a season וְעֵ֥ת <S%H6256><s%> ve-'Et and a time לְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> le-chol every חֵ֖פֶץ <S%H2656><s%> Che-fetz to every purpose תַּ֥חַת <S%H8478><s%> Ta-chat under הַשָּׁמָֽיִם׃ <S%H8064><s%> hash-sha-Ma-yim. under the heaven ס sa-Mek

עֵ֥ת <S%H6256><s%> 'et A time לָלֶ֖דֶת <S%H3205><s%> la-Le-det to be born וְעֵ֣ת <S%H6256><s%> ve-'Et and a time לָמ֑וּת <S%H4191><s%> la-Mut; to die עֵ֣ת <S%H6256><s%> 'et a time לָטַ֔עַת <S%H5193><s%> la-Ta-'at, to plant וְעֵ֖ת <S%H6256><s%> ve-'Et and a time לַעֲק֥וֹר <S%H6131><s%> la-'a-Kor to pluck up נָטֽוּעַ׃ <S%H5193><s%> na-Tu-a'. [that which is] planted

עֵ֤ת <S%H6256><s%> 'et A time לַהֲרוֹג֙ <S%H2026><s%> la-ha-rOg to kill וְעֵ֣ת <S%H6256><s%> ve-'Et and a time לִרְפּ֔וֹא <S%H7495><s%> lir-Po, to heal עֵ֥ת <S%H6256><s%> 'et a time לִפְר֖וֹץ <S%H6555><s%> lif-Rotz to break down וְעֵ֥ת <S%H6256><s%> ve-'Et and a time לִבְנֽוֹת׃ <S%H1129><s%> liv-Not. to build up

עֵ֤ת <S%H6256><s%> 'et A time לִבְכּוֹת֙ <S%H1058><s%> liv-kOt to weep וְעֵ֣ת <S%H6256><s%> ve-'Et and a time לִשְׂח֔וֹק <S%H7832><s%> lis-Chok, to laugh עֵ֥ת <S%H6256><s%> 'et a time סְפ֖וֹד <S%H5594><s%> se-Fod to mourn וְעֵ֥ת <S%H6256><s%> ve-'Et and a time רְקֽוֹד׃ <S%H7540><s%> re-Kod. to dance

עֵ֚ת <S%H6256><s%> 'et A time לְהַשְׁלִ֣יךְ <S%H7993><s%> le-hash-Lich to cast away אֲבָנִ֔ים <S%H68><s%> 'a-va-Nim, stones וְעֵ֖ת <S%H6256><s%> ve-'Et and a time כְּנ֣וֹס <S%H3664><s%> ke-Nos together אֲבָנִ֑ים <S%H68><s%> 'a-va-Nim; stones עֵ֣ת <S%H6256><s%> 'et a time לַחֲב֔וֹק <S%H2263><s%> la-cha-Vok, to embrace וְעֵ֖ת <S%H6256><s%> ve-'Et and a time לִרְחֹ֥ק <S%H7368><s%> lir-Chok to refrain מֵחַבֵּֽק׃ <S%H2263><s%> me-chab-Bek. from embracing

עֵ֤ת <S%H6256><s%> 'et A time לְבַקֵּשׁ֙ <S%H1245><s%> le-vak-Kesh to get וְעֵ֣ת <S%H6256><s%> ve-'Et and a time לְאַבֵּ֔ד <S%H6><s%> le-'ab-Bed, to lose עֵ֥ת <S%H6256><s%> 'et a time לִשְׁמ֖וֹר <S%H8104><s%> lish-Mor to keep וְעֵ֥ת <S%H6256><s%> ve-'Et and a time לְהַשְׁלִֽיךְ׃ <S%H7993><s%> le-hash-Lich. to cast away

עֵ֤ת <S%H6256><s%> 'et A time לִקְר֙וֹעַ֙ <S%H7167><s%> lik-Ro-a' to rend וְעֵ֣ת <S%H6256><s%> ve-'Et and a time לִתְפּ֔וֹר <S%H8609><s%> lit-Por, to sew עֵ֥ת <S%H6256><s%> 'et a time לַחֲשׁ֖וֹת <S%H2814><s%> la-cha-Shot to keep silence וְעֵ֥ת <S%H6256><s%> ve-'Et and a time לְדַבֵּֽר׃ <S%H1696><s%> le-dab-Ber. to speak

עֵ֤ת <S%H6256><s%> 'et A time לֶֽאֱהֹב֙ <S%H157><s%> le-'e-Ho to love וְעֵ֣ת <S%H6256><s%> ve-'Et and a time לִשְׂנֹ֔א <S%H8130><s%> lis-No, to hate עֵ֥ת <S%H6256><s%> 'et a time מִלְחָמָ֖ה <S%H4421><s%> mil-cha-Mah of war וְעֵ֥ת <S%H6256><s%> ve-'Et and a time שָׁלֽוֹם׃ <S%H7965><s%> sha-Lom. of peace ס sa-Mek

מַה־ <S%H4100><s%> mah- What יִּתְרוֹן֙ <S%H3504><s%> yit-rOn What profit הָֽעוֹשֶׂ֔ה <S%H6213><s%> ha-'o-Seh, hath he that worketh בַּאֲשֶׁ֖ר <S%H834><s%> ba-'a-Sher in that wherein ה֥וּא <S%H1931><s%> hu he עָמֵֽל׃ <S%H6001><s%> 'a-Mel. that labors

רָאִ֣יתִי <S%H7200><s%> ra-'I-ti I have seen אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- הָֽעִנְיָ֗ן <S%H6045><s%> ha-'in-Yan, the travail אֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher which נָתַ֧ן <S%H5414><s%> na-Tan hath given אֱלֹהִ֛ים <S%H430><s%> E-lo-Him which God לִבְנֵ֥י <S%H1121><s%> liv-Nei to the sons הָאָדָ֖ם <S%H120><s%> ha-'a-Dam of men לַעֲנ֥וֹת <S%H6031><s%> la-'a-Not to be exercised בּֽוֹ׃ bo.

אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- הַכֹּ֥ל <S%H3605><s%> hak-Kol everything עָשָׂ֖ה <S%H6213><s%> 'a-Sah He hath made יָפֶ֣ה <S%H3303><s%> ya-Peh every [thing] beautiful בְעִתּ֑וֹ <S%H6256><s%> ve-'it-To; in his time גַּ֤ם <S%H1571><s%> gam has also אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- הָעֹלָם֙ <S%H5769><s%> ha-'o-Lam the world נָתַ֣ן <S%H5414><s%> na-Tan also he hath set בְּלִבָּ֔ם <S%H3820><s%> be-lib-Bam, in their heart מִבְּלִ֞י <S%H1097><s%> mib-be-Li so that אֲשֶׁ֧ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher which לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> lo- will not יִמְצָ֣א <S%H4672><s%> yim-Tza can find out הָאָדָ֗ם <S%H120><s%> ha-'a-Dam, no man אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- הַֽמַּעֲשֶׂ֛ה <S%H4639><s%> ham-ma-'a-Seh the work אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher- which עָשָׂ֥ה <S%H6213><s%> 'a-Sah maketh הָאֱלֹהִ֖ים <S%H430><s%> ha-'E-lo-Him that God מֵרֹ֥אשׁ <S%H7218><s%> me-Rosh from the beginning וְעַד־ <S%H5704><s%> ve-'ad- even סֽוֹף׃ <S%H5490><s%> Sof. to the end

יָדַ֕עְתִּי <S%H3045><s%> ya-Da'-ti I know כִּ֛י <S%H3588><s%> ki that אֵ֥ין <S%H369><s%> 'ein there ט֖וֹב <S%H2896><s%> Tov that [there is] no good בָּ֑ם Bam; כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> ki for אִם־ <S%H518><s%> 'im- lo לִשְׂמ֔וֹחַ <S%H8055><s%> lis-Mo-ach, in them but for [a man] to rejoice וְלַעֲשׂ֥וֹת <S%H6213><s%> ve-la-'a-Sot and to do ט֖וֹב <S%H2896><s%> Tov good בְּחַיָּֽיו׃ <S%H2416><s%> be-chai-Yav. in his life

וְגַ֤ם <S%H1571><s%> ve-Gam moreover כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- every הָאָדָם֙ <S%H120><s%> ha-'a-Dam And also that every man שֶׁיֹּאכַ֣ל <S%H398><s%> shei-yo-Chal should eat וְשָׁתָ֔ה <S%H8354><s%> ve-sha-Tah, and drink וְרָאָ֥ה <S%H7200><s%> ve-ra-'Ah and enjoy ט֖וֹב <S%H2896><s%> Tov the good בְּכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> be-chol all עֲמָל֑וֹ <S%H5999><s%> a-ma-Lo; of all his labour מַתַּ֥ת <S%H4991><s%> mat-Tat it [is] the gift אֱלֹהִ֖ים <S%H430><s%> E-lo-Him of God הִֽיא׃ <S%H1931><s%> Hi. I

יָדַ֗עְתִּי <S%H3045><s%> ya-Da'-ti, I know כִּ֠י <S%H3588><s%> ki for כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- all manner אֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher after יַעֲשֶׂ֤ה <S%H6213><s%> ya-'a-Seh doeth הָאֱלֹהִים֙ <S%H430><s%> ha-'E-lo-Him that whatsoever God ה֚וּא <S%H1931><s%> hu he יִהְיֶ֣ה <S%H1961><s%> yih-Yeh will remain לְעוֹלָ֔ם <S%H5769><s%> le-'o-Lam, it shall be for ever עָלָיו֙ <S%H5921><s%> 'a-Lav and אֵ֣ין <S%H369><s%> 'ein nothing לְהוֹסִ֔יף <S%H3254><s%> le-ho-Sif, can be put וּמִמֶּ֖נּוּ <S%H4480><s%> u-mi-Men-nu at אֵ֣ין <S%H369><s%> 'ein is nothing לִגְרֹ֑עַ <S%H1639><s%> lig-Ro-a'; to it nor any thing taken וְהָאֱלֹהִ֣ים <S%H430><s%> ve-ha-'E-lo-Him from it and God עָשָׂ֔ה <S%H6213><s%> 'a-Sah, doeth שֶׁיִּֽרְא֖וּ <S%H3372><s%> shei-yir-'U [it] that [men] should fear מִלְּפָנָֽיו׃ <S%H6440><s%> mil-le-fa-Nav. before

מַה־ <S%H4100><s%> mah- is has שֶּֽׁהָיָה֙ <S%H1961><s%> she-ha-Yah been כְּבָ֣ר <S%H3528><s%> ke-Var That which hath been is now ה֔וּא <S%H1931><s%> Hu, and that וַאֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> va-'a-Sher which לִהְי֖וֹת <S%H1961><s%> lih-Yot been כְּבָ֣ר <S%H3528><s%> ke-Var and that which is to be hath already הָיָ֑ה <S%H1961><s%> ha-Yah; been וְהָאֱלֹהִ֖ים <S%H430><s%> ve-ha-'E-lo-Him been and God יְבַקֵּ֥שׁ <S%H1245><s%> ye-vak-Kesh requireth אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- נִרְדָּֽף׃ <S%H7291><s%> nir-Daf. that which is past

וְע֥וֹד <S%H5750><s%> ve-'od Furthermore רָאִ֖יתִי <S%H7200><s%> ra-'I-ti And moreover I saw תַּ֣חַת <S%H8478><s%> Ta-chat under הַשָּׁ֑מֶשׁ <S%H8121><s%> hash-Sha-mesh; under the sun מְק֤וֹם <S%H4725><s%> me-Kom the place הַמִּשְׁפָּט֙ <S%H4941><s%> ham-mish-Pat of judgment שָׁ֣מָּה <S%H8033><s%> Sham-mah there הָרֶ֔שַׁע <S%H7562><s%> ha-Re-sha', [that] wickedness וּמְק֥וֹם <S%H4725><s%> u-me-Kom [was] there and the place הַצֶּ֖דֶק <S%H6664><s%> hatz-Tze-dek of righteousness שָׁ֥מָּה <S%H8033><s%> Sham-mah there הָרָֽשַׁע׃ <S%H7562><s%> ha-Ra-sha'. [that] iniquity

אָמַ֤רְתִּֽי <S%H559><s%> 'a-Mar-ti I said אֲנִי֙ <S%H589><s%> 'a-Ni I בְּלִבִּ֔י <S%H3820><s%> be-lib-Bi, in mine heart אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- הַצַּדִּיק֙ <S%H6662><s%> hatz-tzad-Dik the righteous וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et הָ֣רָשָׁ֔ע <S%H7563><s%> ha-ra-Sha', and the wicked יִשְׁפֹּ֖ט <S%H8199><s%> yish-Pot shall judge הָאֱלֹהִ֑ים <S%H430><s%> ha-'E-lo-Him; God כִּי־ <S%H3588><s%> ki- for עֵ֣ת <S%H6256><s%> 'et for [there is] a time לְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> le-chol every חֵ֔פֶץ <S%H2656><s%> Che-fetz, there for every purpose וְעַ֥ל <S%H5921><s%> ve-'Al and for כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- every הַֽמַּעֲשֶׂ֖ה <S%H4639><s%> ham-ma-'a-Seh and for every work שָֽׁם׃ <S%H8033><s%> Sham. is there

אָמַ֤רְתִּֽי <S%H559><s%> 'a-Mar-ti I said אֲנִי֙ <S%H589><s%> 'a-Ni I בְּלִבִּ֔י <S%H3820><s%> be-lib-Bi, in mine heart עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- and דִּבְרַת֙ <S%H1700><s%> div-Rat concerning the estate בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> be-Nei of the sons הָאָדָ֔ם <S%H120><s%> ha-'a-Dam, of men לְבָרָ֖ם <S%H1305><s%> le-va-Ram might manifest הָאֱלֹהִ֑ים <S%H430><s%> ha-'E-lo-Him; that God וְלִרְא֕וֹת <S%H7200><s%> ve-lir-'ot them and that they might see שְׁהֶם־ <S%H1992><s%> she-hem- that they בְּהֵמָ֥ה <S%H929><s%> be-he-Mah themselves are beasts הֵ֖מָּה <S%H1992><s%> Hem-mah like לָהֶֽם׃ <S%H1992><s%> la-Hem. like

כִּי֩ <S%H3588><s%> ki For מִקְרֶ֨ה <S%H4745><s%> mik-Reh For that which befalleth בְֽנֵי־ <S%H1121><s%> ve-nei- the sons הָאָדָ֜ם <S%H120><s%> ha-'a-Dam of men וּמִקְרֶ֣ה <S%H4745><s%> u-mik-Reh befalleth הַבְּהֵמָ֗ה <S%H929><s%> hab-be-he-Mah, beasts וּמִקְרֶ֤ה <S%H4745><s%> u-mik-Reh befalleth אֶחָד֙ <S%H259><s%> 'e-Chad even one thing לָהֶ֔ם la-Hem, כְּמ֥וֹת <S%H4194><s%> ke-Mot them as the one dieth זֶה֙ <S%H2088><s%> zeh the other כֵּ֣ן <S%H3651><s%> ken so מ֣וֹת <S%H4194><s%> Mot so dieth זֶ֔ה <S%H2088><s%> Zeh, the other וְר֥וּחַ <S%H7307><s%> ve-Ru-ach breath אֶחָ֖ד <S%H259><s%> 'e-Chad yea they have all one לַכֹּ֑ל <S%H3605><s%> lak-Kol; all וּמוֹתַ֨ר <S%H4195><s%> u-mo-Tar hath no preeminence הָאָדָ֤ם <S%H120><s%> ha-'a-Dam so that a man מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> min- over הַבְּהֵמָה֙ <S%H929><s%> hab-be-he-Mah above a beast אָ֔יִן <S%H369><s%> 'A-yin, and there כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> ki for הַכֹּ֖ל <S%H3605><s%> hak-Kol for all הָֽבֶל׃ <S%H1892><s%> Ha-vel. for all [is] vanity

הַכֹּ֥ל <S%H3605><s%> hak-Kol All הוֹלֵ֖ךְ <S%H1980><s%> ho-Lech All go אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- about מָק֣וֹם <S%H4725><s%> ma-Kom place אֶחָ֑ד <S%H259><s%> 'e-Chad; unto one הַכֹּל֙ <S%H3605><s%> hak-Kol All הָיָ֣ה <S%H1961><s%> ha-Yah came מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> min- from הֶֽעָפָ֔ר <S%H6083><s%> he-'a-Far, all are of the dust וְהַכֹּ֖ל <S%H3605><s%> ve-hak-Kol and all שָׁ֥ב <S%H7725><s%> shav again אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to הֶעָפָֽר׃ <S%H6083><s%> he-'a-Far. to dust

מִ֣י <S%H4310><s%> mi Who יוֹדֵ֗עַ <S%H3045><s%> yo-De-a', Who knoweth ר֚וּחַ <S%H7307><s%> Ru-ach the spirit בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> be-Nei afflicted הָאָדָ֔ם <S%H120><s%> ha-'a-Dam, of man הָעֹלָ֥ה <S%H5927><s%> ha-'o-Lah that goeth הִ֖יא <S%H1931><s%> hi he לְמָ֑עְלָה <S%H4605><s%> le-Ma-'e-lah; upward וְר֙וּחַ֙ <S%H7307><s%> ve-Ru-ach and the spirit הַבְּהֵמָ֔ה <S%H929><s%> hab-be-he-Mah, of the beast הַיֹּרֶ֥דֶת <S%H3381><s%> hai-yo-Re-det that goeth הִ֖יא <S%H1931><s%> hi he לְמַ֥טָּה <S%H4295><s%> le-Mat-tah downward לָאָֽרֶץ׃ <S%H776><s%> la-'A-retz. I

וְרָאִ֗יתִי <S%H7200><s%> ve-ra-'I-ti, Wherefore I perceive כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> ki that אֵ֥ין <S%H369><s%> 'ein nothing טוֹב֙ <S%H2896><s%> tOv that [there is] nothing better מֵאֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> me-'a-Sher after יִשְׂמַ֤ח <S%H8055><s%> yis-Mach should rejoice הָאָדָם֙ <S%H120><s%> ha-'a-Dam than that a man בְּֽמַעֲשָׂ֔יו <S%H4639><s%> be-ma-'a-Sav, in his own works כִּי־ <S%H3588><s%> ki- for ה֖וּא <S%H1931><s%> hu that חֶלְק֑וֹ <S%H2506><s%> chel-Ko; for that [is] his portion כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> ki For מִ֤י <S%H4310><s%> mi who יְבִיאֶ֙נּוּ֙ <S%H935><s%> ye-vi-'En-nu for who shall bring לִרְא֔וֹת <S%H7200><s%> lir-'ot, him to see בְּמֶ֖ה <S%H4100><s%> be-Meh what שֶׁיִּהְיֶ֥ה <S%H1961><s%> shei-yih-Yeh will occur אַחֲרָֽיו׃ <S%H310><s%> 'a-cha-Rav. what shall be after
